name: DarkFantasyFight
description:
Pitch
      Dark Fantasy Game is a short action-RPG game inspired from the Dark Souls games. You play as a knight who has to defeat a ghost knight protected by an army of skeletons.

Controls

  • ZQSD to move
  • Left Click to attack
  • Right Click to parry
  • Spacebar to roll
  • LeftShift to run
  • Esc to open the menu
